data.message: Freestyle #2.... my heart is as about as empty as my fridge which is a bad combination because when I'm hungry I'm hungry like the wolf and I don't see any pigs so I guess imma have to settle on eatin your kids I might need a bib because I can get messier than a caveman butt fucking a hippie while their both taking a shit... and on a side note if you wanna beef just know that I own a slaughter house and I'm a wolf amongst you baby sheep so do your best not to sleep because I'm coming after you like Krueger in your nightmares and daydreams you gonna have to cut your fuckin eyelids off just to stay awake I'm scarier than Jason Voorhees rising up out of the lake and I know it's a little off subject but I think your wife is hot I wanna take her back to my place and fuck her on my cot wait a minute on second thought my house burned down now it's just a vacant lot.... like this shit you fucks and I'm down for any battle raps inbox me if you think your worthy
